items.sentence: I came to the conclusion that I shouldn't do that.
The loss of her husband was a great blow for Mary.
Mary placed her baby in a car seat for the flight.
Are you sure that your haven't forgotten anything?
Tom's doctor told him to cut down on his drinking.
What's the most effective way to learn a language?
I got a blister on my hand from practicing tennis.

You should've asked Tom for permission to do that.
Tom knew that Mary would get angry if he did that.
